posts.post_content:
I quite like seeing functional reprints like this. Llanowar Elves is from a different era and has had a very long and fruitful reign.

Posted By: Kryptnyt (7/10/2013 6:06:03 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I like this. [Arbor Elf](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Arbor Elf) was kind of cool when you have a shockland, but he was also kind of a whiff when you draw all checklands and/or something non-Forest like [Sacred Foundry](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sacred Foundry). This is more consistent.  
  
(Although this doesn't help you cast [Boros Reckoner](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Boros Reckoner) like [Avacyn's Pilgrim](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Avacyn's Pilgrim) does. You could try to mitigate this issue with [Burning-Tree Emissary](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Burning-Tree Emissary), which allows you to cast Reckoner starting with say GGRR...)
posts.html:
I like this. Arbor Elf was kind of cool when you have a shockland, but he was also kind of a whiff when you draw all checklands and/or something non-Forest like Sacred Foundry. This is more consistent.
